content: What 1984 movie features a group of parapsychologists who start a ghost-catching business in New York City?

The movie you're referring to is "Ghostbusters." It was released in 1984 and stars Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, and Ernie Hudson as parapsychologists who start a ghost-catching business in New York City to combat a surge in paranormal activity. The film was a huge success and spawned a sequel, "Ghostbusters II," in 1989, as well as a 2016 reboot featuring an all-female cast led by Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon, and Leslie Jones.
